name: Sleep Walking
description:
This is a game about a sleepwalking person who needs to get to their bed in order to prevent waking up in the middle of the house. While they are sleepwalking, they are moving in the real world and in the dream that they are experiencing. If they are not careful, they will wake up from their dream in the wrong spot. Make sure that they get to their bed!

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Press "ESC" to end game.

Press "R" to reset the room.

Credits:

Juliette Amorati - Art and Sound Design

Connor Redwine - Level Design and Development
